title: The iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls: Starlight Stage - 5-shuunen Kinen "Go Just Go!" PV

alternative_titles.en: The iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls: Starlight Stage - 5th Anniversary! "Go Just Go!" PV
alternative_titles.ja: 【デレステ】5周年記念！「Go Just Go!」アニメPV

synopsis: An animated commercial by CloverWorks promoting the THE iDOLM@STER: Cinderella Girls - Starlight Stage (iOS/Android game)'s fifth anniversary. The commercial features an animated music video of the song "Go Just Go!" which was released for the game's anniversary.
